Feb the 15th 1865
To his Excellency Thomas E. Bram^lette^
Govenor of the State of Ky
Dear Sir
we have been greatly Molested by the Guirillars in the Sothern Portion of Marion County Ky I appeal to you for information as to what terms I can raise a company for the Benefit of Said county
Having Served 3 years in the service I think I can raise one hundred men I would like if I get the wright information to make up my company to make my headquarters at Lebanon Ky
If this ^offer^ meets your wishes Please rite to me at Bradfordsvi^lle^

yours with honour
L. T Robert..Purdy
Thomas E. Bramle^tte^
Govenor of Ky

Bradfordsville Ky
Feby. 15" 1865
Purdy Robert
Lt.
To The Gov.
Upon what terms can he raise a Co. for protection of Marion County --

no authy

Recd A. G. O. Ky 27 Feby 1865
